authors.name: Muhammed Moussa
authors.introduction: A human developing software. I work at Ericsson. I enjoy placidity, running, music and taking long walks or sleeps at the beach.
authors.tech_introduction: a frontend software developer thrives in agile environments, leveraging cloud, quality and server-side expertise and a deep interest in WebComponents, JAMstack, and WASM to craft modern web experiences. With hands-on experience across diverse domains like Fintech, ERP, Marketing, Events, and SaaS, to deliver impactful solutions that cater to user needs across industries.
